title: Sequencing and facilitation strategies to enhance learning effectiveness in VR environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of robotics and VR environments, intermediate-level social domain expertise
context.additional_context: Learners access simulation environments via VR headsets and LMS, with continuous learning effect monitoring through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can acquire basic knowledge of robot operation principles by sequentially integrating VR animations and auditory text information
Learners enhance their ability to convert VR learning content into applicable scenarios based on advanced questioning prompts
Learners can self-diagnose achievement levels of knowledge, comprehension, and application through formative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
